personal_info.summary: A dedicated Account Manager specializing in web development, API integration, and project management. Experienced in managing client relationships and providing technical solutions with exceptional problem-solving and communication skills. Proficient in leveraging API technologies to drive seamless integrations and enhance user experiences. Committed to optimizing onboarding processes, providing technical guidance, and ensuring client success in a dynamic environment.

responsibilities: Manage publisher accounts across LATAM, optimizing ad revenue and script integrations.
Troubleshoot technical issues related to script implementation, infrastructure blocks, and ad performance.
Provide data-driven recommendations to improve script efficiency and ad visibility.
Developed and optimized the new website using ReactJS, improving UI/UX.
Integrated AMP technology, enhancing mobile accessibility and site speed.
Improved SEO ranking through structured metadata and optimized content strategies.
Reduced website loading times by 30% through performance enhancements.
Led industrial automation projects, including PLC and SCADA programming.
Managed the complete automation of a cement factory from design to execution.
Provided technical support and troubleshooting for production systems.

projects.name: Metromedics Platform
projects.description: Developed the landing page for metromedics.com.co and a platform for tracking calibration certificates and quality management system for the metrology laboratory.

projects.name: Environmental Monitoring Platform - Smaf
projects.description: Developed a monitoring platform for environmental variables in crops, allowing users to visualize data trends through interactive graphs over different time periods.

projects.name: Web app leposti.com
projects.description: Developed an application to order legal publications using NextJS and integrated with Strapi and PAYU.

projects.name: El Espectador UI Redesign
projects.description: Contributed to the UI redesign, developing reusable React components.
